name: Overclocked Beams
desc: All TTSC ships are are modified to extend the range of beam weapons by %s, damage by %s and increase their turn rate by %s. Cumulative with Integrated Targeting Unit and Dedicated Targeting Core.
short: Increases beam weapon range and damage.

name: Flux Capacitor Subroutines
desc: Being a member of TTSC grants you access to subroutines that increase flux capacity of %s/%s/%s/%s and flux dissipation by  %s/%s/%s/%s, depending on hull size.
